title: IHMC controller occasionally crashes on re-harness due to "no convergence"

content.raw:
I'm implementing the re-harness using the service from pull request #68 and I occasionally get the following error. After that, the controller stops working and Val falls.

~~~
[ERROR] [1495584215.633274039, 35.310000000]: us.ihmc.tools.exceptions.NoConvergenceException
[ERROR] [1495584215.633434027, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.momentumBasedController.optimization.InverseDynamicsQ
PSolver.solve(InverseDynamicsQPSolver.java:341)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633480395, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.momentumBasedController.optimization.InverseDynamicsO
ptimizationControlModule.compute(InverseDynamicsOptimizationControlModule.java:164)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633528461, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyInverseDynamicsSolver.compute
(WholeBodyInverseDynamicsSolver.java:137)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633568089, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyControllerCore.doInverseDynam
ics(WholeBodyControllerCore.java:215)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633628033, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyControllerCore.compute(WholeB
odyControllerCore.java:179)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633677589, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.HighLevelHumanoidControllerM
anager.doControl(HighLevelHumanoidControllerManager.java:183)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633720892, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.robotics.robotController.ModularRobotController.doControl(ModularRobotController.
java:20)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633761790, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.DRCControllerThread.run(DRCControllerThread.java:352)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633823743, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.concurrent.SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController$ReentrantL
ockedControlElementRunner.run(SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController.java:89)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633875528, 35.310000000]:   at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[ INFO] [1495584215.634083316, 35.310000000]: [WARN] (InverseDynamicsOptimizationControlModule.java:171): Only showing the stack trace of th
e first NoConvergenceException. This may be happening more than once.
~~~
content.html:
I'm implementing the re-harness using the service from pull request #68 and I occasionally get the following error. After that, the controller stops working and Val falls.

[ERROR] [1495584215.633274039, 35.310000000]: us.ihmc.tools.exceptions.NoConvergenceException
[ERROR] [1495584215.633434027, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.momentumBasedController.optimization.InverseDynamicsQ
PSolver.solve(InverseDynamicsQPSolver.java:341)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633480395, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.momentumBasedController.optimization.InverseDynamicsO
ptimizationControlModule.compute(InverseDynamicsOptimizationControlModule.java:164)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633528461, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyInverseDynamicsSolver.compute
(WholeBodyInverseDynamicsSolver.java:137)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633568089, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyControllerCore.doInverseDynam
ics(WholeBodyControllerCore.java:215)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633628033, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerCore.WholeBodyControllerCore.compute(WholeB
odyControllerCore.java:179)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633677589, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.HighLevelHumanoidControllerM
anager.doControl(HighLevelHumanoidControllerManager.java:183)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633720892, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.robotics.robotController.ModularRobotController.doControl(ModularRobotController.
java:20)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633761790, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.DRCControllerThread.run(DRCControllerThread.java:352)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633823743, 35.310000000]:   at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.concurrent.SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController$ReentrantL
ockedControlElementRunner.run(SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController.java:89)
[ERROR] [1495584215.633875528, 35.310000000]:   at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[ INFO] [1495584215.634083316, 35.310000000]: [WARN] (InverseDynamicsOptimizationControlModule.java:171): Only showing the stack trace of th
e first NoConvergenceException. This may be happening more than once.
